Key Match Events: The Cardinals were unable to score in the ninth inning after Austin Wells' two-run home run in the eighth inning extended the Yankees' lead to 6-3.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cardinals have struggled to win at Yankee Stadium, with a 0-4 record in their four previous visits.
Post-Match Reflections: The loss hurt the Cardinals' playoff chances and extended their surprising streak of not winning at Yankee Stadium.
